title: Magnificent 7’s Stock Market Dominance Shows Signs of Cracking
description: To beat the market in recent years, many investors applied a simple strategy: Load up on the biggest US technology stocks.
content: To beat the market in recent years, many investors applied a simple strategy: Load up on the biggest US technology stocks.
